message.name: APPLICATIONSUBMITTED
message.locale: Registration successful for New Application No. %1s Social Security Administration

message.name: APPLICATIONAPPROVED
message.locale: Acceptance of your application in social security number, Application Number: %1s

message.name: NO_PARTICIPANTS_SELECTED
message.locale: Atleaset one participant must be selected to export into excel
يجب اختيار منتفع واحد على الأقل للإرسال إلى excel

message.name: NO_CONCERNROLE_SELECTED
message.locale: Atleaset one participant must be selected to send SMS

message.name: SMS_CATEGOEY_AND_TEMPLATE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Both SMS Category and SMS Template must be selected to send SMS
يجب اختيار كل من فئة الرسالة القصيرة وقالب الرسالة القصيرة لإرسال رسالة قصير

message.name: SMS_AGE_FROM_AND_TO_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: In order to search using age both to and from need to be entered
من أجل البحث باستخدام السن يجب إدخال من وإلى على حد سواء

message.name: SALARYINFORMATION
message.locale: Total social assistance for this month is: %1s Riyals
